body.name: Easter Cloth Napkins Set of 4, Washable Reusable Dinner Cocktail Napkin for Kitchen Party Wedding Banquet Holiday Baby Shower Table Decor Bunny Spring Floral Botanical Colorful Eggs Plaid
features: PERFECT OVERSIZED DINNERE NAPKINS: Our cloth napkins are 20x20 inches. Dinner napkins are oversized and can not only fit your table and plate mat perfectly, but also can make various unique elegant shapes according to your preferences. These napkins can be easily handled by anyone, and our cloth napkins can also be used as hand towels for easy carrying around.

HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS: Premium durable polyester fabric napkins, comfortable, anti-wrinkle, soft touch and good water absorption. You can tile and design any fold you want without worrying about wrinkles. These holiday napkins become softer and do not fall apart during multiple machine washing or hand washing, and the edging and seamless structure add them durability. Graduation napkins can be rolled up and stored conveniently.

MAINTENANCE METHOD: Our friendsgiving napkins can be washed by hand or machine (using cold water), can be recycled for many times. The hem is designed with folded border and fine stitching to ensure elegant looking and no loose threads. Using high-definition printing technology, beautiful pattern printing is very realistic, and bright printing colors will not fade.

COUNTLESS USES: These napkins everyday can highlight your unique and elegant home decorations, not only for home dining and holiday dinners, but also for wedding napkins, birthday parties, hotel napkins, restaurant napkins, banquet napkins, gradution napkins, beverage napkins, bridal shower napkins, happy birthday napkins, wedding napkins for receptions, bar napkins, fathers day napkins, holiday funny napkins and party napkins! It is a most to redesign the decoration of dinner immediately!

NAPKINS EVERYDAY: Cloth napkins are a great way to make your dining table welcoming, beautiful napkins & easy to wash. Pair with tablecloths, placemats, or table runners for the complete effect. These dinner napkins are not only good for home decor but make great for events and business settings as well. Provide a light but cozy feel to your dining table. If you have any problem, please contact us without any hesitate.
